original_title: In the Beginning: Moses the Egyptian
overview: MOSES THE EGYPTIAN, Episode Ten of In The Beginning Bible Series , Moses' parents, fearing for his life, place him adrift on the Nile in a basket, where he is found by the Pharaoh's daughter and raised as a Prince of Egypt. The discovery that he is really an Israelite, sends him into exile in the desert.
title: In the Beginning: Moses the Egyptian
